PHRASE.LANG: To say that you are big headed is truly an understatement when wearing this crazy head. Have onlookers stare at you with disbelief as you sport the largest cranium PlayStation®Home has ever seen.[#Legal]
Vous aurez clairement la grosse tête avec cette tête démente. Les gens n'en croiront pas leurs yeux quand ils vous apercevront avec le plus gros crâne jamais vu dans PlayStation®Home.[#Legal]

Wenn du diesen verrückten Kopf trägst, kann dir niemand sagen, du hättest einen großen Kopf, denn das wäre stark untertrieben. Alle werden dich anstarren, wenn du den größten Schädel trägst, den die PlayStation®Home je gesehen hat.[#Legal]
Definirti un testone è davvero poco quando indossi questa testa pazza. Tutti ti guarderanno increduli mentre tu vai in giro con la testa più grande che PlayStation®Home abbia mai visto![#Legal]

Decir que tienes un cabezón cuando lleves puesta esta cabeza tan loca será más bien cuestión de modestia. Gracias a el cráneo más grande de PlayStation®Home conseguirás que todos se giren con cara de incrédulos al verte pasar.[#Legal]
이 미치광이 머리를 착용하면 단순히 큰 머리는 비교도 할 수 없습니다. PlayStation®Home 최대의 두개골을 사람들에게 뽐내세요.[#Legal]

To say that you are big headed is truly an understatement when wearing this crazy head. Have onlookers stare at you with disbelief as you sport the largest cranium PlayStation®Home has ever seen.[#Legal]
若說你有個大頭，那是未能準確說明戴上這個瘋狂頭套後的效果。讓路人難以相信地盯著你，就像你看到從未在PlayStation®Home中見過的超大號頭形。[#Legal]
若說你有個大頭，那是未能準確說明戴上這個瘋狂頭套後的效果。讓路人難以相信地盯著你，就像你看到從未在PlayStation®Home中見過的超大號頭形。[#Legal]

To say that you are big headed is truly an understatement when wearing this crazy head. Have onlookers stare at you with disbelief as you sport the largest cranium PlayStation®Home has ever seen.[#Legal]
